subject: Don't waste your time. Cheap pills are here.
body:
Dear valued member.
Read this special pharmacy bulletin from the leading Canadian on-line drug store. 
There is no need to purchase expensive American drugs. Buy Canadian products manufactured according to the same strict medical standards followed in the United States.
To order your products just click here and follow step-by-step instructionshttp://showweek.hk
We offer a full range of modern pharmaceutical products.High level of our service will exceed your expectations. 
Yours faithfully,Diana Dietz
